name: My family and I love this app, it's convenient for school picture days, holidays, and sports events. Our family is large, so it's quick and easy scheduling us all in at the same time.

I'm a busy man, and I hate waiting for something minor in my life such as a haircut. Of course I still want to look good though, and this app helps me get booked in quicklyâ€” with my favourite stylist everytime. I always leave my salon happy.
My hairstylist is booked up quite often as she's super amazing. This app is handy to see what her schedule is like and what times match up for the both of us.
